text: intent: register improve-web agent, ship web UI improvements via agent delegation, explore mux agent creation flow

outcome: improve-web agent shipped 10 UX features in 2 rounds (hover previews, [[slug]] rendering, settings panel, session previews, agent links, SSE streaming, light/dark mode, mobile CSS, newest-first messages). Confirmed get_pending_messages idempotency issue and web pseudo-agent TOML gap. Tasked SSE inotify replacement.

gotcha: web agent (pseudo, auto-registered) had 12 pending messages in mux with no .toml — messages just queued unread. Required 'kg run test' to act as coordinator relay to improve-web agent. 'kg launcher agent resume web' would fail (no TOML)
pending: SSE _stream_agent_events() 1s poll should be replaced with inotify-simple watches on messages.db + session JSONL dirs — already a dep, no new deps needed [[kg-web]] [[kg-architecture]]
